title: The Voice UK's Olly Murs sports bleach blond hairdo similar to Emma Willis' at show's launch
text:
The lineup of coaches on the The Voice UK has undergone something of a shakeup, after Meghan Trainor was announced as a replacement for Jennifer Hudson.

And returning star Olly Murs, 35, showed that things have also changed on the coiffure front on Monday night, when he stepped out with a new bleach blond hairdo while attending the show's first blind auditions at Manchester's MediaCityUK.

The Troublemaker singer, known for having darker locks since rising to fame, bore a resemblance to the show's host Emma Willis, whose tresses have been worn in a cropped platinum style since late last year.

Blond ambition: Olly Murs The Voice UK's first blind auditions on Monday night sporting a new bleach blond look, which left him resembling show host Emma Willis

Olly stepped out in dapper style for the big event, donning a black tuxedo, which he teamed with a white shirt with an embellished collar.

He struck a series of playful poses as he greeted throngs of fans lined up outside the venue, encouraging them to cheer louder as he hyped them up.

Also displaying her blonde hairstyle, host Emma Willis, 43, was typically glamorous in a mixed texture velvet dress, which featured a patent bodice.

Hair's something new: Olly showed off his new 'do as he arrived at Manchester's MediaCityUK

Flaxen: The star was seen sporting locks that were notably lighter than his usual darker look

Pictured: As with his co-stars, singer Olly stopped to pose for selfies with a number of fans

Dapper gent: Olly stepped out in dapper style for the big event, donning a black tuxedo, which he teamed with a white shirt with an embellished collar

They were joined at the event by incoming coach Meghan Trainor, who has been drafted in to replace outgoing show regular Jennifer Hudson.

The news singing will see Meghan, 25, sit alongside returning star coaches Sir Tom Jones, will.i.am and Olly Murs.

Jennifer tweeted that she was not set for a return last month, writing: 'Hey y’all! I’m sad to share that I won’t be able to join my friends in the red chair for @TheVoiceUK this season due to filming commitments here in the States.

'I sure will miss my UK family, but I’ll be back soon for ‘Cats’ and ‘Respect’! Throw some shoes for me in the mean time.'

Oscar-winning Dreamgirls star Jennifer had appeared on the series for the past three seasons.

Stepping out in style: Emma looked typically glamorous as she arrived at the red carpet event wearing a mixed texture velvet dress, which featured a patent bodice

Outing: (L-R) Meghan Trainor and Emma Willis attended a photocall ahead of watching the first set of blind auditions for The Voice UK at Manchester's MediacityUK on Monday night

Show debut: Meghan stepped out in style as she made her debut as a coach on the talent show

All together now: (L-R) AJ Odudu, Olly, Emma, Sir Tom Jones, Meghan and will.i.am got togeter for a group shot at the event

She is instead busy preparing for the December release of the hotly-anticipated film adaptation of Cats and will soon start shooting the Aretha Franklin biopic, Respect.

Meghan is no stranger to judging talent shows, appearing as a guest at Judges Houses on The X Factor UK in the past.

In the US, she has been a judge on FOX’s singing contest THE FOUR: Battle for Stardom for two seasons alongside Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs and DJ Khaled.

Of her appointment to The Voice, she said: 'I am so excited and honoured to join Sir Tom, will.i.am and Olly Murs as the new Coach on The Voice UK!

'It’s a dream come true and I can’t wait to sit in the chair with my own button and listen to some incredible new talent!'

Meghan burst onto the music scene with the worldwide smash single All About That Bass in 2014 – a song that made her one of only five female artists to achieve a Diamond certification.

Outgoing: Meghan Trainor, 25, will replace outgoing show regular Jennifer Hudson, 38
description: The Troublemaker singer, 35, turned heads as he arrived at Manchester's MediaCityUK sporting the new look on Monday night.
